metadata.feature_description: Handles file upload with validation tokens and download with permission checks, supporting both inline and attachment modes

steps.action: Navigate to Assets > My Website and click Add Asset button
steps.actual: Upload dialog appeared with drag-and-drop area and file browser option

steps.expected: File should upload successfully with confirmation
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully, showing 'File uploaded' status with checkmark

steps.action: Open Add Asset dialog and upload test_image_upload.png
steps.expected: Image file should upload successfully with preview
steps.actual: Image uploaded successfully, showing thumbnail preview and 'File uploaded' status

steps.expected: System should reject the file with appropriate error message
steps.actual: File rejected with 'File extension not allowed.' error message displayed in red

steps.action: Click on test_upload_valid.txt file in the assets list
steps.actual: File downloaded successfully to local system, content verified to match uploaded content

steps.expected: Content should match original uploaded file
steps.actual: Downloaded file content matches: 'This is a test file for upload testing created on Sat, Feb 28, 2026 9:45:26 AM'

steps.action: Hover over file to reveal action buttons, then click download icon
steps.expected: Download button should be visible and trigger file download
steps.actual: Action buttons (edit, move, copy, download, delete) visible on hover. Download triggered successfully

steps.expected: Text file content should display inline in browser
steps.actual: Text file content displayed directly in browser showing the file text

steps.expected: Image should display inline in browser
steps.actual: Image displayed inline in browser showing the CAVALIER logo (225x60 PNG)

steps.expected: Should display contents of Images subfolder
steps.actual: Images folder opened showing various image files and subfolders

steps.expected: File should upload to the Images subfolder
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully to Images folder, path shown as 'Images/subfolder_upload_test.txt'

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Upload file with special characters in filename

steps.expected: File with special characters should upload successfully
steps.actual: File uploaded successfully, filename preserved with special characters: 'Images/test_special_!@#chars.txt'

steps.action: Enter 'test' in search box and press Enter
steps.expected: Files containing 'test' in filename should be displayed
steps.actual: Search results displayed with files matching 'test', search term highlighted in yellow in filenames

steps.action: Observe upload dialog with Decompress Zip Files toggle
steps.expected: Toggle should be present and default to Off
steps.actual: Decompress Zip Files toggle present in upload dialog, defaulted to Off position

observations: The Assets module provides comprehensive file management capabilities including upload, download, move, copy, and delete operations
File type validation works correctly, blocking prohibited file extensions like .exe
Inline viewing works for both text files and images when accessed via direct URL
The system properly preserves special characters in filenames during upload
Search functionality works across the assets folder with highlighted search terms
Files show 'Draft' status after upload until published, indicating workflow integration
The UI provides clear visual feedback during upload progress and success/failure states
Sort options available: Last Modified, Date Uploaded, Alphabetical
Sync folder functionality available to synchronize folder contents with file system
